rows.label: tlk41700321_05_msg0001
rows.name:
After discussing it with the other Chiefs of Gula,
we've decided to erect a memorial for the people
of Iraada Village.

rows.label: tlk41700321_05_msg0002
rows.name:
We will mourn and pray for the souls of the villagers
who were so senselessly killed in that sudden attack.

rows.label: tlk41700321_05_msg0003
rows.name:
I hear the bandits have already been transported to
the Superbian mainland and imprisoned.

rows.label: tlk41700321_05_msg0004
rows.name:
We are also consulting with the Superbian Imperial Army
to have them strengthen security throughout Gula.

rows.label: tlk41700321_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I just hope that never again will a person with an evil
heart come to possess a Blade...
